thread.title: City of Sao Paulo declares state of emergency due to trucker protest

title: City of Sao Paulo declares state of emergency due to trucker protest
text:
SAO PAULO (Reuters) - South Americaâ€™s biggest city and main business hub declared a state of emergency on Friday, suspending non-essential administrative services to save fuel amid a trucking protest that has blockaded major Brazilian highways for five days.
Cars line at a gasoline station as they wait to fuel up, in Manaus, Brazil May 24, 2018. REUTERS/Adriano Machado In a statement, City Hall said the state of emergency would allow it to seize private goods such as fuel stored at a gas station and make purchases without going through standard budgeting and bidding procedures.
Reporting by Alberto Alerigi Jr.
